PageTitle: advertise ebgp enable (BGP IPv6 SR-Policy address family view)
FuncDef:
The advertise ebgp enable command enables a device to advertise SRv6 TE Policy routes to EBGP peers.
The undo advertise ebgp enable command disables a device from advertising SRv6 TE Policy routes to EBGP peers.
By default, a device is disabled from advertising SRv6 TE Policy routes to EBGP peers.
ParentView: BGP IPv6 SR-Policy address family view
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SRv6 TE Policy is a tunneling technology developed based on SRv6. An SRv6 TE Policy route dynamically generated by a controller needs to be transmitted to a forwarder through BGP extension. By default, SRv6 TE Policy routes are advertised only to IBGP peers. To advertise SRv6 TE Policy routes to EBGP peers, run the advertise ebgp enable command.
